heading: Candidate Engagement
intro: Global Bridge engages individuals seeking overseas employment through structured and documented processes aligned to employer demand.
subIntro: Candidate engagement begins only where roles, requirements, and deployment parameters have been defined by employers and partners.

expectations.title: Clear Role Requirements
expectations.description: Clear role requirements and eligibility criteria are provided upfront.

expectations.title: Rigorous Screening
expectations.description: Screening is conducted based on employer needs and candidate suitability.

expectations.title: Documented Processes
expectations.description: Documented processes are followed step by step for transparency and consistency.

expectations.title: Consistent Communication
expectations.description: Communication on progress is provided as processes move forward.

cta: Candidates who meet requirements and are prepared to follow defined procedures are welcome to contact us for guidance on available opportunities.
